modelResult.response:
The company vacation policy allows employees to take paid time off based on their tenure:

| Tenure | Annual PTO Days |
|--------|----------------|
| 0–2 years | 15 days |
| 3–5 years | 20 days |
| 6+ years | 25 days |

**Key Points:**
- PTO requests must be submitted at least **2 weeks** in advance via the HR Portal
- Manager approval is required for absences longer than 3 consecutive days
- Up to **5 unused days** can be carried over to the next year
- Unused days beyond the carryover limit will be forfeited on December 31

For parental leave, bereavement, or medical leave, please refer to the separate **Leave of Absence** policy or contact HR directly.

citations.page_content:
Vacation Policy

All full-time employees are entitled to paid vacation days. Accrual is based on years of service: 0-2 years receive 15 days, 3-5 years receive 20 days, and 6+ years receive 25 days per calendar year.

Carryover Policy

Employees may carry over up to 5 unused vacation days to the following year. Any days beyond this limit will be forfeited as of December 31. Requests for exceptions must be submitted to HR by November 15.

PTO Request Process

All PTO requests should be submitted through the HR Portal at least 14 calendar days before the intended start date. Manager approval is automatically required for absences exceeding 3 consecutive business days.
